title: Happy Vegan Shop
description: Small veg food shop, established Sept 2012. It's the showroom for its internet shop which has a courier service across Moscow and delivers to other Russian places via mail order. Offers a varied range of food products including many organic and all natural. Between Arbatskaya, Kropotkinskaya, and Smolenskaya metro stations, it's located a bit hidden in a backyard but easy to find when following the signs placed at the gate and in the backyard.
